SAFE CHILDBIRTH CHECKLIST IMPLEMENTATION GUIDE  46  
GLOSSARY
                    
Checking the mother at the time of admission is important to detect and treat 
complications that she may already have, to confirm whether she needs to be 
referred to another facility, to prepare her (and her companion) for labour and 
delivery, and to educate her (and her companion) about danger signs for which 
she should call for help.
